eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION NOTICE for the following counties or areas: Boulder, CO; at 03:40 PM ON JAN 5, 2026 Effective until 04:40 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Emergency officials have issued additional EVACUATION ORDER areas North of Dillon and South of Northwest Parkway at 15:40:31 on 01-05-2026 due to a Wildfire occurring.  Click www.BOCO911Alert.org for a map of the affected area and detailed information.
